sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { GloabalContext } from '../context/GlobalState' const IncomeExpenses = () => { const {transactions} = useContext(GloabalContext) const amounts = transactions.map(transaction => transaction.amount) const income = amounts .filter( item => item > 0) .reduce((acc, item) => (acc += item),0) .toFixed(2) const expense = amounts.filter( item => item < 0) .reduce((acc, item ) => (acc += item),0) .toFixed(2) return (

Income

{income}

Expense

{expense}

) } export default IncomeExpenses
